tutorials.title: Takeoff and Land
tutorials.xml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <block type="fly" id="I6E]IViwk}x#!TLJvYH:" x="10" y="10">
    <statement name="commands">
      <block type="move" id="i,8m6A8f^gg/c1RieZYo">
        <field name="direction">FORWARD</field>
        <field name="duration">1</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>

tutorials.title: Forward
tutorials.description: The command "forward(x)" means to move the drone forward for x seconds
tutorials.xml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <block type="fly" id="I6E]IViwk}x#!TLJvYH:" x="10" y="10">
    <statement name="commands">
      <block type="move" id="i,8m6A8f^gg/c1RieZYo">
        <field name="direction">FORWARD</field>
        <field name="duration">1</field>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>

tutorials.xml:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">

    <statement name="commands">
      <block type="move" id="i,8m6A8f^gg/c1RieZYo">

      </block>
